attributes.action: threaten to cut the A400m order if Spain gets Airbus work from Bristol at the expense of the British jobs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Spain is attemepting  to gain the work on the A400M from Bristol and 900 jobs by offering to pay to cover any cost overruns if it will get the work.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
